name: r.a.g
description:
NO MACS ALLOWED

CONTROLLER NEEDED

START RESETS THE GAME

SELECT CLOSES THE GAME

HIT THE ENEMIES WITH THE SHOOT

RB TO SHOOT 

RIGHT THUMB STICK TO CONTROL SHOOT

LEFT TRIGGER TO GRAB

RIGHT TRIGGER TO BOOST WITH SHOOT

BALLS BREAK WALLS

SQUARES BREAK PEOPLE

IF SNOW HALATION THEN TOUCH GREEN COMPUTER

RED COMPUTER SPAWNS ENEMY

ENEMY DIES WITH SNOW HALATION

IF TODD IS LYING THEN ALT F4

WHEN YOU ARE DONE PLEASE FILL OUT THIS GOOGLE FORUM THANKYOU
